00098       public override void BeginConstructor(TreeNode node, List<string> modifiers, List<Parameter> parameters, TreeNode bas)
00099       {
00100          if (bas != null)
00101          {
00102             bas.Entry = new IdEntry();
00103             TreeNode treeArgs = (TreeNode)bas.GetChild(0);
00104             Type[] args = new Type[treeArgs.ChildCount];
00105             for (int i = 0; i < treeArgs.ChildCount; i++)
00106             {
00107                args[i] = ((TreeNode)treeArgs.GetChild(i).GetChild(0)).ReturnType;
00108             }
00109 
00110             Type baseType = currentType.BaseType;
00111             IdEntry entry = this.GetConstructorIdEntry(baseType, args);
00112             ConstructorInfo cons = entry != null ? (ConstructorInfo)entry.ReflectionObject : null;
00113             if (cons == null)
00114                throw new CheckerException(node, "No constructor can be found for " + currentType.BaseType.FullName);
00115             if (cons.IsPrivate)
00116                throw new CheckerException(node, "Constructor for " + currentType.BaseType.FullName + " is not accessible");
00117 
00118             bas.Entry = entry;
00119          }
00120          else
00121          {
00122             IdEntry entry = this.GetConstructorIdEntry(currentType.BaseType, Type.EmptyTypes);
00123             if (entry == null)
00124                throw new CheckerException(node, "No suitable base constructor found to call");
00125             ConstructorInfo cons = (ConstructorInfo)entry.ReflectionObject;
00126             if (cons == null)
00127                throw new CheckerException(node, "No parameterless constructor can be found for " + currentType.BaseType.FullName);
00128             if (cons.IsPrivate)
00129                throw new CheckerException(node, "Constructor for " + currentType.BaseType.FullName + " is not accessible");
00130             TreeNode child = (TreeNode)node.GetChild(1);
00131             child.Entry = entry;
00132 
00133          }
00134       }

00141       public override void WhileLoop(TreeNode node)
00142       {
00143          TreeNode entrySelf = ((TreeNode)(node.GetChild(0)));
00144          TreeNode entry1 = ((TreeNode)(node.GetChild(1)));
00145 
00146          if (entrySelf.ReturnType != typeof(Boolean))
00147          {
00148             throw new CheckerException(node, "System.Boolean expected here, got: " + entrySelf.ReturnType.FullName);
00149          }
00150 
00151          node.ReturnType = typeof(void);
00152       }

00154       public override void DeclarationStatement(TreeNode node, Qualifier qualifier, string identifier)
00155       {
00156          IdEntry entry = new IdEntry();
00157          IdEntry t = this.GetTypeIdEntry(qualifier.ToString());
00158          if (t == null)
00159          {
00160             throw new CheckerException(node, "Type " + qualifier + " cannot be found");
00161          }
00162          entry.ReflectionObject = currentMethod.DefineLocal(t, identifier);
00163          node.EntryType = EntryType.Variable;
00164          entry.Node = node;
00165          node.ReturnType = typeof(void);
00166          try
00167          {
00168             currentMethod.SymbolTable.Enter(identifier, entry);
00169          }
00170          catch (SymbolTableException ex)
00171          {
00172             throw new CheckerException(node, ex.Message);
00173          }
00174 
00175          node.Entry = entry;
00176       }

00178       public override void ObjectCreation(TreeNode node, Qualifier qualifier)
00179       {
00180          Type t = lib.GetType(qualifier.ToString(), searchPath);
00181          // check other assemblies
00182 
00183          if (t == null)
00184             throw new CheckerException(node, "Type cannot be found " + qualifier.ToString());
00185          if (t.IsAbstract)
00186             throw new CheckerException(node, "Abstract type " + t.FullName + " cannot be instantiated");
00187 
00188          TreeNode args = (TreeNode)node.GetChild(1);
00189          Type[] types = new Type[args.ChildCount];
00190 
00191          for (int i = 0; i < args.ChildCount; i++)
00192          {
00193             types[i] = ((TreeNode)(args.GetChild(i).GetChild(0))).ReturnType;
00194          }
00195 
00196          if (t.IsSubclassOf(typeof(MulticastDelegate)) && types.Length == 1 && types[0] is MethodType)
00197          {
00198             types = new Type[] { typeof(object), typeof(IntPtr) };
00199          }
00200 
00201          IdEntry entry = GetConstructorIdEntry(t, types);
00202          ConstructorInfo cons = entry != null ? (ConstructorInfo)entry.ReflectionObject : null;
00203          if (cons == null)
00204          {
00205             throw new CheckerException(node, "Constructor of type " + t.FullName + " is not defined");
00206          }
00207 
00208          if (!IsAccessible(cons, currentType.FullName.Equals(t.FullName), false, false))
00209             throw new CheckerException(node, "Constructor of type " + t.FullName + " is not accessible");
00210 
00211          node.Entry = entry;
00212          node.ReturnType = t;
00213       }

00223       private bool IsAccessible(ICollection<string> modifiers, bool inclass, bool inparent, bool inassembly)
00224       {
00225          if (inclass)
00226             return true;
00227          if (inparent)
00228             return modifiers.Contains("public") || modifiers.Contains("internal") || modifiers.Contains("protected");
00229          if (inassembly)
00230             return modifiers.Contains("public") || modifiers.Contains("internal");
00231 
00232          return modifiers.Contains("public");
00233       }
00234 
00243       private bool IsAccessible(MethodBase info, bool inclass, bool inparent, bool inassembly)
00244       {
00245          if (inclass)
00246             return true;
00247          if (inparent && inassembly)
00248             return info.IsPublic || info.IsFamily || info.IsFamilyAndAssembly || info.IsFamilyOrAssembly;
00249          if (inparent)
00250             return info.IsPublic || info.IsFamily || info.IsFamilyOrAssembly;
00251          if (inassembly)
00252             return info.IsPublic || info.IsAssembly || info.IsFamilyOrAssembly;
00253 
00254          return info.IsPublic;
00255       }
00256 
00265       private bool IsAccessible(FieldInfo info, bool inclass, bool inparent, bool inassembly)
00266       {
00267          if (inclass)
00268             return true;
00269          if (inparent && inassembly)
00270             return info.IsPublic || info.IsFamily || info.IsFamilyAndAssembly || info.IsFamilyOrAssembly;
00271          if (inparent)
00272             return info.IsPublic || info.IsFamily || info.IsFamilyOrAssembly;
00273          if (inassembly)
00274             return info.IsPublic || info.IsAssembly || info.IsFamilyOrAssembly;
00275 
00276          return info.IsPublic;
00277       }

00279       public override void InvocationExpr(TreeNode node, string identifier)
00280       {
00281          TreeNode child = (TreeNode)node.GetChild(0);
00282          Type t = child.ReturnType ?? (Type)child.Entry.ReflectionObject;
00283          bool isstatic = child.ReturnType == null ? true : false;
00284          bool inclass = currentType.FullName.Equals(t.FullName);
00285          bool inparent = currentType.IsSubclassOf(t);
00286          IdEntry id;
00287 
00288          if (child.EntryType == EntryType.Constant && child.Entry.Node.GetChild(0).GetChild(child.Entry.Node.GetChild(0).ChildCount - 1).Type == VnvdGenerator.ARRAY)
00289          {
00290             throw new CheckerException(node, "Calling method on a constant array");
00291          }
00292 
00293          if (node.ChildCount > 2)
00294          {
00295             TreeNode args = (TreeNode)node.GetChild(2);
00296             Type[] types = new Type[args.ChildCount];
00297 
00298             for (int i = 0; i < args.ChildCount; i++)
00299             {
00300                types[i] = ((TreeNode)(args.GetChild(i).GetChild(0))).ReturnType;
00301             }
00302 
00303             id = GetMethodIdEntry(t, identifier, types);
00304             MethodInfo m = id != null ? (MethodInfo)id.ReflectionObject : null;
00305 
00306             String methodName = (t.Namespace != String.Empty ? t.Namespace + "." : String.Empty) + t.Name + "." + identifier + "(";
00307             for (int i = 0; i < types.Length; i++)
00308             {
00309                methodName += (types[i].Namespace != String.Empty ? types[i].Namespace + "." : String.Empty) + types[i].Name;
00310 
00311                if (i < types.Length - 1)
00312                {
00313                   methodName += ", ";
00314                }
00315             }
00316             methodName += ")";
00317 
00318             if (m != null)
00319             {
00320                if (isstatic && !m.IsStatic)
00321                   throw new CheckerException(node, "Calling non-static method (" + methodName + ")  from static context");
00322                if (!isstatic && m.IsStatic)
00323                   throw new CheckerException(node, "Accessing static method (" + methodName + ")  from nonstatic context");
00324                if (!IsAccessible(m, inclass, inparent, false))
00325                   throw new CheckerException(node, "Method " + methodName + " not accessible");
00326 
00327                node.Entry = id;
00328                node.ReturnType = m.ReturnType;
00329                node.EntryType = EntryType.Method;
00330 
00331             }
00332             else
00333             {
00334                throw new CheckerException(node, "Method unknown: " + methodName + " on " + t.FullName);
00335             }
00336          }
00337          else
00338          {
00339             MethodInfo m;
00340             if ((id = GetFieldIdEntry(t, identifier)) != null)
00341             {
00342                FieldInfo f = (FieldInfo)id.ReflectionObject;
00343                if (isstatic && !f.IsStatic)
00344                   throw new CheckerException(node, "Accessing non-static field (" + f.Name + ") from static context");
00345                if (!isstatic && f.IsStatic)
00346                   throw new CheckerException(node, "Accessing static field (" + f.Name + ") from nonstatic context");
00347                if (!IsAccessible(f, inclass, inparent, false))
00348                   throw new CheckerException(node, "Field " + f.Name + " not accessible");
00349 
00350                if (f.IsLiteral)
00351                {
00352                   node.Value = (f is UserField) ? ((UserField) f).ConstantValue : f.GetRawConstantValue();
00353                }
00354 
00355                node.Entry = id;
00356                node.ReturnType = f.FieldType;
00357                node.EntryType = EntryType.Field;
00358             }
00359             else if ((id = GetEventIdEntry(t, identifier)) != null)
00360             {
00361                EventInfo f = (EventInfo)id.ReflectionObject;
00362                m = f.GetAddMethod();
00363                if (!isstatic && m.IsStatic)
00364                   throw new CheckerException(node, "Accessing static field (" + f.Name + ") from nonstatic context");
00365                if (isstatic && !m.IsStatic)
00366                   throw new CheckerException(node, "Accessing an event (" + f.Name + ") from static context");
00367                if (!IsAccessible(m, inclass, inparent, false))
00368                   throw new CheckerException(node, "Event " + f.Name + " not accessible");
00369 
00370                node.Entry = id;
00371                node.ReturnType = f.EventHandlerType;
00372                node.EntryType = EntryType.Event;
00373             }
00374             else
00375             {
00376                TreeNode p = (TreeNode)node.Parent.Parent.Parent;
00377                if (p.Type != VnvdChecker.NEW)
00378                {
00379                   throw new CheckerException(node, "Unknown field: " + identifier + " on " + t.FullName);
00380                }
00381                else
00382                {
00383                   Qualifier q = GetFullQualifier(p.GetChild(0));
00384                   IdEntry entry = this.GetTypeIdEntry(q.ToString());
00385                   if (entry == null)
00386                      throw new CheckerException(p, "Type not found " + q.ToString());
00387 
00388                   Type type = (Type)entry.ReflectionObject;
00389                   MethodInfo mInvoke = type.GetMethod("Invoke");
00390 
00391                   if (mInvoke == null)
00392                   {
00393                      throw new CheckerException(p, "Unknown field: " + identifier + " on " + t.FullName);
00394                   }
00395                   ParameterInfo[] pars = mInvoke.GetParameters();
00396                   
00397                   Type[] mPars = new Type[pars.Length];
00398                   for (int i = 0; i < pars.Length; i++)
00399                   {
00400                      mPars[i] = pars[i].ParameterType;
00401                   }
00402 
00403                   entry = this.GetMethodIdEntry(t, identifier, mPars);
00404                   if (entry == null)
00405                   {
00406                      throw new CheckerException(node, "Method or field not found " + identifier + " on " + t.FullName);
00407                   }
00408                   m = (MethodInfo)entry.ReflectionObject;
00409 
00410                   if (!isstatic && m.IsStatic)
00411                      throw new CheckerException(node, "Accessing static method (" + m.Name + ") from nonstatic context");
00412                   if (isstatic && !m.IsStatic)
00413                      throw new CheckerException(node, "Accessing a method (" + m.Name + ") from static context");
00414                   if (!IsAccessible(m, inclass, inparent, false))
00415                      throw new CheckerException(node, "Method " + m.Name + " is not accessible");
00416 
00417                   node.Entry = entry;
00418                   node.ReturnType = MethodType.GetMethodType(m);
00419                }
00420             }
00421          }
00422       }

00437       public override void ArrayElementedCreationExpr(TreeNode node)
00438       {
00439          IdEntry q = this.GetTypeIdEntry(this.FullQualifier(node.GetChild(0)).ToString());
00440 
00441          if (q != null)
00442          {
00443             Type arrayType = ((Type)q.ReflectionObject);
00444             IdEntry el = GetTypeIdEntry(arrayType.GetElementType().FullName);
00445             
00446             if (!arrayType.IsArray)
00447             {
00448                throw new CheckerException(node, "Array initialization expression must be an array type");
00449             }
00450 
00451             TreeNode child = (TreeNode)node.GetChild(1);
00452             for (int i = 0; i < child.ChildCount; i++)
00453             {
00454                TreeNode element = (TreeNode)child.GetChild(i);
00455                element.Entry = el;
00456 
00457                if (!IsAssignableFrom((Type)el.ReflectionObject, element.ReturnType))
00458                {
00459                   throw new CheckerException(element, "Array element is of a different type");
00460                }
00461             }
00462 
00463             node.ReturnType = arrayType;
00464             node.Entry = el;
00465          }
00466          else
00467          {
00468             throw new CheckerException(node, "Type array initialization not found ");
00469          }
00470       }
00471 
00472       public override void AssignmentExpr(TreeNode node)
00473       {
00474          this.CheckTwoSidedNode(node, true);
00475          TreeNode child2 = (TreeNode)node.GetChild(0);
00476          if (child2.EntryType == EntryType.Method || child2.EntryType == EntryType.Event || child2.EntryType == EntryType.Constant)
00477          {
00478             TreeNode child = (TreeNode)node.GetChild(0).GetChild(0);
00479             throw new CheckerException(node, "Left part of assignment is not assignable: " + (child.ReturnType != null ? child.ReturnType.FullName + "::" + node.GetChild(0).GetChild(1).Text : String.Empty));
00480          }
00481          else if(child2.EntryType == EntryType.Field)
00482          {
00483             FieldInfo f = (FieldInfo)child2.Entry.ReflectionObject;
00484             if ((f.IsInitOnly && (currentMethod.MemberType != MemberTypes.Constructor || currentMethod.IsStatic != f.IsStatic)) || f.IsLiteral)
00485             {
00486                throw new CheckerException(node, "A value cannot be assigned to the constant or initonly variable: " + f.Name);
00487             }
00488          }
00489          node.Entry = child2.Entry;
00490       }

00492       public override void TernaryExpr(TreeNode node)
00493       {
00494          TreeNode entrySelf = ((TreeNode)(node.GetChild(0)));
00495          TreeNode entry1 = ((TreeNode)(node.GetChild(1)));
00496          TreeNode entry2 = ((TreeNode)(node.GetChild(2)));
00497 
00498          if (entrySelf.ReturnType != typeof(bool))
00499          {
00500             throw new CheckerException(node, "System.Boolean expected here, got: " + entrySelf.ReturnType.FullName);
00501          }
00502 
00503          if (entry2 == null || !entry1.ReturnType.FullName.Equals(entry2.ReturnType.FullName))
00504          {
00505             // then and else types don't match, or else part is missing so return type is void
00506             node.ReturnType = typeof(void);
00507          }
00508          else
00509          {
00510             // return type is type of then and else part
00511             node.ReturnType = entry1.ReturnType;
00512          }
00513       }

00515       public override void Method(TreeNode node, List<string> modifiers, Qualifier qualifier, string identifier, List<Parameter> parameters)
00516       {
00517          TreeNode entry1 = ((TreeNode)(node.GetChild(4)));
00518          MethodInfo m = ((MethodInfo) node.Entry.ReflectionObject);
00519          Type ret = m.ReturnType;
00520 
00521          if (!m.IsAbstract && ret != typeof(void) && (ret.IsValueType || entry1.ReturnType != NullType.Default) && !IsAssignableFrom(entry1.ReturnType, ret))
00522          {
00523             throw new CheckerException(node, "Method return type does not match: got: " + entry1.ReturnType.FullName + ", expected: " + ret.FullName);
00524          }
00525 
00526          currentMethod.SymbolTable.CloseScope();
00527       }

00551          if (!CheckBinaryOperatorOverload(node, "op_LessThan", node.ReturnType))
00552          {
00553             throw new CheckerException(node, "Type " + node.ReturnType + " is not compatible with the < operator");

00601       public override void PlusExpr(TreeNode node)
00602       {
00603          TreeNode child = (TreeNode)node.GetChild(0);
00604          this.CheckTwoSidedNode(node);
00605          if (!CheckBinaryOperatorOverload(node, "op_Addition", child.ReturnType))
00606          {
00607             if (child.ReturnType == typeof(string))
00608             {
00609                node.Entry = new IdEntry();
00610                node.Entry.ReflectionObject = typeof(String).GetMethod("Concat",
00611                                                                        new Type[] { typeof(object), typeof(object) });
00612                node.ReturnType = child.ReturnType;
00613             }
00614             else
00615             {
00616                throw new CheckerException(node, "Type " + node.ReturnType + " is not compatible with the + operator");
00617             }
00618          }
00619       }

00648       public override void ModExpr(TreeNode node)
00649       {
00650          this.CheckTwoSidedNode(node);
00651          if (!CheckBinaryOperatorOverload(node, "op_Modulus", node.ReturnType))
00652          {
00653             throw new CheckerException(node, "Type " + node.ReturnType + " is not compatible with the % operator");
00654          }
00655       }
00656 
00657       public override void LogicNotExpr(TreeNode node)
00658       {
00659          TreeNode child = (TreeNode)node.GetChild(0);
00660          if (!CheckUnaryOperatorOverload(node, "op_LogicalNot", child.ReturnType))
00661          {
00662             throw new CheckerException(node, "Type " + child.ReturnType + " is not compatible with the ! operator");
00663          }
00664       }
00665 
00673       public bool CheckBinaryOperatorOverload(TreeNode node, String operator_, Type t)
00674       {
00675          if (t.IsPrimitive)
00676          {
00677             node.Entry = new IdEntry();
00678             node.ReturnType = t;
00679             return true;
00680          }
00681          else if ((node.Entry = this.GetMethodIdEntry(t, operator_, new Type[] { t, t })) != null)
00682          {
00683             node.ReturnType = ((MethodInfo)node.Entry.ReflectionObject).ReturnType;
00684             return true;
00685          }
00686          else
00687          {
00688             node.Entry = new IdEntry();
00689             return false;
00690          }
00691       }
00692 
00700       public bool CheckUnaryOperatorOverload(TreeNode node, String operator_, Type t)
00701       {
00702          if (t.IsPrimitive)
00703          {
00704             node.Entry = new IdEntry();
00705             node.ReturnType = t;
00706             return true;
00707          }
00708          else if ((node.Entry = this.GetMethodIdEntry(t, operator_, new Type[] { t })) != null)
00709          {
00710             node.ReturnType = ((MethodInfo)node.Entry.ReflectionObject).ReturnType;
00711             return true;
00712          }
00713          else
00714          {
00715             return false;
00716          }
00717       }
00718 
00725       public void CheckTwoSidedNode(TreeNode node, bool isAssignment)
00726       {
00727          TreeNode node1 = ((TreeNode)(node.GetChild(0)));
00728          TreeNode node2 = ((TreeNode)(node.GetChild(1)));
00729 
00730          if (node2.ReturnType != null && (isAssignment ? (!IsAssignableFrom(node1.ReturnType, node2.ReturnType) && node2.ReturnType != NullType.Default) : (node1.ReturnType != node2.ReturnType && node1.ReturnType != NullType.Default && node2.ReturnType != NullType.Default))
00731             )
00732          {
00733             throw new CheckerException(node, "Types do not match: " + node1.ReturnType.FullName + " and " + node2.ReturnType.FullName);
00734          }
00735 
00736          node.ReturnType = node2.ReturnType != NullType.Default ? node2.ReturnType : node1.ReturnType;
00737       }
00738 
00744       public void CheckTwoSidedNode(TreeNode node)
00745       {
00746          this.CheckTwoSidedNode(node, false);
00747       }
00748 
00749       public override void VariableUsed(TreeNode node, Qualifier qual)
00750       {
00751          IdEntry entry;
00752          if (qual.Count == 1 && (entry = currentMethod.SymbolTable.Retrieve(qual[0])) != null)
00753          {
00754             node.Entry = entry;
00755             node.ReturnType = entry.ReflectionObject is UserLocal
00756                                  ? ((UserLocal)entry.ReflectionObject).LocalType
00757                                  : ((UserParameter)entry.ReflectionObject).ParameterType;
00758 
00759             if (entry.Node != null && entry.Node.EntryType == EntryType.Constant)
00760             {
00761                node.Value = entry.Node.Value;
00762                node.EntryType = EntryType.Constant;
00763             }
00764          }
00765          else
00766          {
00767             node.Entry = this.GetTypeIdEntry(qual.ToString());
00768             if (node.Entry == null)
00769             {
00770                throw new CheckerException(node, "Type " + qual + " cannot be found");
00771             }
00772          }
00773       }
00774 
00775       public override void LiteralNull(TreeNode node)
00776       {
00777          node.ReturnType = NullType.Default;
00778          node.Value = DBNull.Value;
00779       }
00780 
00781       public override void LiteralNumber(TreeNode node)
00782       {
00783          node.ReturnType = typeof(Int32);
00784          node.Value = Int32.Parse(node.Text);
00785       }

00788       {
00789          node.ReturnType = typeof(double);
00790          node.Value = Double.Parse(node.Text, numberformat);
00791       }
00792 
00793       public override void LiteralString(TreeNode node)
00794       {
00795          node.ReturnType = typeof(String);
00796 
00797          try
00798          {
00799             node.Value = StringHelper.StringFromCSharpLiteral(node.Text.Substring(1, node.Text.Length - 2));
00800          }
00801          catch (ArgumentException e)
00802          {
00803             throw new CheckerException(node, e.Message);
00804          }
00805       }
00806

00808       {
00809          node.ReturnType = typeof(Char);
00810 
00811          try
00812          {
00813             node.Value = StringHelper.CharFromCSharpLiteral(node.Text.Substring(1, node.Text.Length - 2));
00814          }
00815          catch (ArgumentException e)
00816          {
00817             throw new CheckerException(node, e.Message);
00818          }
00819       }

00822       {
00823          node.ReturnType = typeof(Boolean);
00824          node.Value = Boolean.Parse(node.Text);
00825       }

00827       public override void ExpressionBlock(TreeNode node)
00828       {
00829          TreeNode expr = (TreeNode)node.GetChild(0);
00830          node.ReturnType = expr.ReturnType;
00831       }
00832 
00833       public override void StatementBlock(TreeNode node)
00834       {
00835          if (node.ChildCount > 0)
00836          {
00837             TreeNode child = ((TreeNode) (node.GetChild(node.ChildCount - 1)));
00838             node.ReturnType = child.ReturnType;
00839             if (child.Type == VnvdChecker.LOCAL || child.Type == VnvdChecker.CONST)
00840             {
00841                throw new CheckerException((TreeNode)node.GetChild(node.ChildCount - 1), "A compound expression must not end with a declaration.");
00842             }
00843          }
00844          else
00845          {
00846             node.ReturnType = typeof(void);
00847          }
00848       }

00862       }

00864       public override void BeginNamespace(TreeNode node, Qualifier qual)

00867          currentNamespace = node.Text;

00872          node.ReturnType = ((TreeNode)node.GetChild(node.ChildCount - 1)).ReturnType;
00873       }

00875       public override void LiteralThis(TreeNode node)
00876       {
00877          node.Entry = currentType.Entry;
00878          node.ReturnType = currentType;
00879 
00880          if (currentMethod.IsStatic)
00881          {
00882             throw new CheckerException(node, "Cannot reference to this in a static context");
00883          }
00884       }
00885 
00886       public override void LiteralBase(TreeNode node)
00887       {
00888          node.Entry = currentType.Entry;
00889          node.ReturnType = currentType.BaseType;
00890 
00891          if (currentMethod.IsStatic)
00892          {
00893             throw new CheckerException(node, "Cannot reference to base in a static context");
00894          }
00895          if (node.Parent.Type != VnvdChecker.DCOLON)
00896          {
00897             throw new CheckerException(node, "The keyword base cannot be used in this context");
00898          }
00899       }
00900 
00901       public override void CastExpression(TreeNode node, Qualifier qual)
00902       {
00903          node.Entry = GetTypeIdEntry(qual.ToString());
00904          if (node.Entry == null)
00905          {
00906             throw new CheckerException(node, "Type " + qual + " cannot be found");
00907          }
00908          node.ReturnType = (Type)node.Entry.ReflectionObject;
00909 
00910          TreeNode child = (TreeNode)node.GetChild(1);
00911          if (!IsAssignableFrom(child.ReturnType, node.ReturnType) && !IsAssignableFrom(node.ReturnType, child.ReturnType) && !(child.ReturnType.IsPrimitive && node.ReturnType.IsPrimitive))
00912             throw new CheckerException(node, "Unable to cast " + child.ReturnType.FullName + " to " + qual.ToString());
00913       }
00914 
00915       public override void CastAsExpression(TreeNode node, Qualifier qual)
00916       {
00917          node.Entry = GetTypeIdEntry(qual.ToString());
00918          if (node.Entry == null)
00919          {
00920             throw new CheckerException(node, "Type " + qual + " cannot be found");
00921          }
00922          node.ReturnType = (Type)node.Entry.ReflectionObject;
00923 
00924          TreeNode child = (TreeNode)node.GetChild(0);
00925          if (!IsAssignableFrom(child.ReturnType, node.ReturnType) && !IsAssignableFrom(node.ReturnType, child.ReturnType))
00926             throw new CheckerException(node, "Unable to cast " + child.ReturnType.FullName + " to " + qual.ToString());
00927       }
00928 
00929       public override void UnaryPlusExpr(TreeNode node)
00930       {

00932          if (!CheckUnaryOperatorOverload(node, "op_UnaryPlus", child.ReturnType))
00933          {
00934             throw new CheckerException(node, "Type " + child.ReturnType + " is not compatible with the unary + operator");
00935          }
00936       }
00937 
00938       public override void UnaryMinusExpr(TreeNode node)
00939       {

00942          {
00943             throw new CheckerException(node, "Type " + child.ReturnType + " is not compatible with the unary - operator");
00944          }
00945       }

00955       public override void BeginCatch(TreeNode node, TreeNode node2, Qualifier qual, string identifier)
00956       {
00957          Type exc = ((UserLocal)node2.Entry.ReflectionObject).LocalType;
00958          if (!IsAssignableFrom(typeof(Exception), exc))
00959          {
00960             throw new CheckerException(node, "Only types which extend System.Exception may be caught: " + exc.FullName);
00961          }

00976       public override void ConstantDeclaration(TreeNode node, Qualifier qualifier, string identifier)
00977       {
00978          TreeNode literal = (TreeNode)node.GetChild(2);
00979 
00980          IdEntry entry = new IdEntry();
00981          IdEntry t = this.GetTypeIdEntry(qualifier.ToString());
00982          if (t == null)
00983          {
00984             throw new CheckerException(node, "Type " + qualifier + " cannot be found");
00985          }
00986          entry.ReflectionObject = currentMethod.DefineLocal(t, identifier);
00987          node.EntryType = EntryType.Constant;
00988          entry.Node = node;
00989          node.ReturnType = literal.ReturnType;
00990          node.Value = literal.Value;
00991 
00992          if (((UserLocal)entry.ReflectionObject).LocalType != node.ReturnType)
00993          {
00994             throw new CheckerException(node, "Constant literal is not of the declared type");
00995          }
00996 
00997          try
00998          {
00999             currentMethod.SymbolTable.Enter(identifier, entry);
01000          }
01001          catch (SymbolTableException ex)
01002          {
01003             throw new CheckerException(node, ex.Message);
01004          }
01005 
01006          node.Entry = entry;
01007       }
01008 
01009       public override void AccessArray(TreeNode node)
01010       {
01011          TreeNode child1 = (TreeNode)node.GetChild(0);
01012          TreeNode child2 = (TreeNode)node.GetChild(1);
01013          if (!child1.ReturnType.IsArray)
01014          {
01015             throw new CheckerException(node, "Accessing elements is only allowed on an array type");
01016          }
01017          if (child2.ReturnType != typeof(int))
01018          {
01019             throw new CheckerException(node, "Array accessing expression must be of type System.Int32");
01020          }
01021 
01022          node.ReturnType = child1.ReturnType.GetElementType();
01023          node.Entry = child1.Entry;
01024 
01025          if (child1.EntryType == EntryType.Constant)
01026          {
01027             node.EntryType = EntryType.Constant;
01028 
01029             if (child2.Value == null)
01030             {
01031                throw new CheckerException(node, "Array accessing expression on constant arrays must be a literal.");
01032             }
01033 
01034             int element = (int) child2.Value;
01035             int elementCount = child1.Entry.Node.GetChild(2).ChildCount;
01036 
01037             if (element >= elementCount)
01038             {
01039                throw new CheckerException(node, "Array index out of bounds on constant array.");
01040             }
01041 
01042             TreeNode valueElement = (TreeNode) child1.Entry.Node.GetChild(2).GetChild(element);
01043 
01044             node.Value = valueElement.Value;
01045             child2.Value = null;
01046          }
01047          else
01048          {
01049             node.EntryType = EntryType.Array;
01050          }
01051 
01052       }
01053 
01054       public override void ArrayCreationExpr(TreeNode node)
01055       {
01056          IdEntry q = this.GetTypeIdEntry(this.FullQualifier(node.GetChild(0)).ToString());
01057 
01058          if (q != null)
01059          {
01060             TreeNode child = (TreeNode)node.GetChild(1);
01061             if (child.ReturnType == typeof(int))
01062             {
01063                node.ReturnType = ((Type)q.ReflectionObject).MakeArrayType();
01064                node.Entry = q;
01065             }
01066             else
01067             {
01068                throw new CheckerException(node, "Array initialization expression must be of type System.Int32");
01069             }
01070          }
01071          else
01072          {
01073             throw new CheckerException(node, "Type array initialization not found ");
01074          }
01075       }
01076 
01077       public override void ConstDecl(TreeNode node)
01078       {
01079 
01080       }
01081 
01082       public override void ThrowStatement(TreeNode node)
01083       {
01084          TreeNode node2 = (TreeNode)node.GetChild(0);
01085          if (!IsAssignableFrom(typeof(Exception), node2.ReturnType))
01086          {
01087             throw new CheckerException(node, "Only types which extend System.Exception may be thrown: " + node2.ReturnType.FullName);
01088          }
01089 
01090          node.ReturnType = typeof(void);
01091          node.Entry = node2.Entry;
01092       }
01093 
01099       public IdEntry GetTypeIdEntry(String name)
01100       {
01101          Type t = lib.GetType(name);
01102          if (t != null)
01103          {
01104             if (t is UserType)
01105                return ((UserType)t).Entry;
01106             else
01107                return new IdEntry() { ReflectionObject = t };
01108          }
01109 
01110          foreach (String s in searchPath)
01111          {
01112             t = lib.GetType(s + "." + name);
01113             if (t != null)
01114             {
01115                if (t is UserType)
01116                   return ((UserType)t).Entry;
01117                else
01118                   return new IdEntry() { ReflectionObject = t };
01119             }
01120          }
01121          return null;
01122       }
01123 
01130       public IdEntry GetEventIdEntry(Type searchType, String searchEvent)
01131       {
01132          EventInfo t = searchType.GetEvent(searchEvent, BindingFlags.FlattenHierarchy | BindingFlags.Static | BindingFlags.Instance | BindingFlags.Public | BindingFlags.NonPublic);
01133          if (t != null)
01134          {
01135             //if (t is UserMethod)
01136             //   return ((UserMethod)t).Entry;
01137             //else
01138             return new IdEntry() { ReflectionObject = t };
01139          }
01140          return null;
01141       }
01142 
01150       public IdEntry GetMethodIdEntry(Type searchType, String searchMethod, Type[] paramTypes)
01151       {
01152          if (ContainsErrorType(paramTypes))
01153             return null;
01154 
01155          MethodInfo t = searchType.GetMethod(searchMethod, BindingFlags.FlattenHierarchy | BindingFlags.Static | BindingFlags.Instance | BindingFlags.Public | BindingFlags.NonPublic, CustomBinder.Default, paramTypes, null);
01156          if (t != null)
01157          {
01158             if (t is UserMethod)
01159                return ((UserMethod)t).Entry;
01160             else
01161                return new IdEntry() { ReflectionObject = t };
01162          }
01163          return null;
01164       }
01165 
01172       public IdEntry GetFieldIdEntry(Type searchType, String searchField)
01173       {
01174          FieldInfo t = searchType.GetField(searchField, BindingFlags.FlattenHierarchy | BindingFlags.Static | BindingFlags.Instance | BindingFlags.Public | BindingFlags.NonPublic);
01175          if (t != null)
01176          {
01177             if (t is UserField)
01178                return ((UserField)t).Entry;
01179             else
01180                return new IdEntry() { ReflectionObject = t };
01181          }
01182          return null;
01183       }
01184 
01190       private bool ContainsErrorType(Type[] paramTypes)
01191       {
01192          foreach (Type t in paramTypes)
01193          {
01194             if (t == ErrorType.Default)
01195                return true;
01196          }
01197          return false;
01198       }
01199 
01206       public IdEntry GetConstructorIdEntry(Type searchType, Type[] paramTypes)
01207       {
01208          if (ContainsErrorType(paramTypes))
01209             return null;
01210          ConstructorInfo t = searchType.GetConstructor(BindingFlags.FlattenHierarchy | BindingFlags.Instance | BindingFlags.Public | BindingFlags.NonPublic, CustomBinder.Default, paramTypes, new ParameterModifier[] { });
01211          if (t != null)
01212          {
01213             if (t is UserConstructor)
01214                return ((UserConstructor)t).Entry;
01215             else
01216                return new IdEntry() { ReflectionObject = t };
01217          }
01218          return null;
01219       }

01231          }

01238       public override void ReadExpression(TreeNode node, String identifier)
01239       {
01240          IdEntry entry;
01241          if ((entry = currentMethod.SymbolTable.Retrieve(identifier)) != null)
01242          {
01243             node.Entry = entry;
01244             node.ReturnType = entry.ReflectionObject is UserLocal
01245                                  ? ((UserLocal)entry.ReflectionObject).LocalType
01246                                  : ((UserParameter)entry.ReflectionObject).ParameterType;
01247          }
01248          else
01249          {
01250             throw new CheckerException(node, "Only local variables can be used as argument of read()");
01251          }
01252       }
01253 
01254       public override void ReadVoidExpression(TreeNode node, String identifier)
01255       {
01256          IdEntry entry;
01257          if ((entry = currentMethod.SymbolTable.Retrieve(identifier)) != null)
01258          {
01259             node.Entry = entry;
01260          }
01261          else
01262          {
01263             node.Entry = this.GetTypeIdEntry(identifier);
01264             if (node.Entry == null)
01265             {
01266                throw new CheckerException(node, "Type " + identifier + " cannot be found");
01267             }
01268          }
01269 
01270          node.ReturnType = typeof(void);
01271       }

01284       public override void AddEventExpr(TreeNode node)
01285       {
01286          node.EntryType = ((TreeNode)node.GetChild(0)).EntryType;
01287          if (node.EntryType != EntryType.Event)
01288             throw new CheckerException(node, "Operator += can only be used on events");
01289          this.CheckTwoSidedNode(node, true);
01290          node.Entry = ((TreeNode) node.GetChild(0)).Entry;
01291       }

01293       public override void RemoveEventExpr(TreeNode node)
01294       {
01295          node.EntryType = ((TreeNode)node.GetChild(0)).EntryType;
01296          if (node.EntryType != EntryType.Event)
01297             throw new CheckerException(node, "Operator -= can only be used on events");
01298          this.CheckTwoSidedNode(node, true);
01299          node.Entry = ((TreeNode)node.GetChild(0)).Entry;
01300       }

01302       public override void LogicOrExpr(TreeNode node)
01303       {
01304          this.CheckTwoSidedNode(node);
01305          if (!CheckBinaryOperatorOverload(node, "op_BitwiseOr", node.ReturnType) && !node.ReturnType.IsDefined(typeof(FlagsAttribute), true))
01306          {
01307             throw new CheckerException(node, "Type " + node.ReturnType + " is not compatible with the | operator");
01308          }
01309       }

01312       {
01313          this.CheckTwoSidedNode(node);
01314          if (!CheckBinaryOperatorOverload(node, "op_ExclusiveOr", node.ReturnType) && !node.ReturnType.IsDefined(typeof(FlagsAttribute), true))
01315          {
01316             throw new CheckerException(node, "Type " + node.ReturnType + " is not compatible with the ^ operator");
01317          }
01318       }
01319

01321       {
01322          this.CheckTwoSidedNode(node);
01323          if (!CheckBinaryOperatorOverload(node, "op_BitwiseAnd", node.ReturnType) && !node.ReturnType.IsDefined(typeof(FlagsAttribute), true))
01324          {
01325             throw new CheckerException(node, "Type " + node.ReturnType + " is not compatible with the & operator");
01326          }
01327       }

01371       public override void ConstantArray(TreeNode node)
01372       {
01373          node.ReturnType = ((TreeNode)node.GetChild(0)).ReturnType.MakeArrayType();
01374 
01375          for (int i = 1; i < node.ChildCount; i++)
01376          {
01377             TreeNode element = (TreeNode)node.GetChild(i);
01378 
01379             if (((TreeNode)node.GetChild(0)).ReturnType != element.ReturnType)
01380             {
01381                throw new CheckerException(element, "Constant array element is of a different type");
01382             }
01383          }
01384       }
01385

01387       {
01388          node.ReturnType = ((TreeNode)node.GetChild(0)).ReturnType;
01389          node.Value = ((TreeNode) node.GetChild(0)).Value;
01390       }

01395       }

01398       {
01399       }

01401 
01405    public class CheckerException : Exception
01406    {
01407       private List<Pair<TreeNode, String>> errors;
01408 
01412       public CheckerException()
01413       {
01414          this.errors = new List<Pair<TreeNode, string>>();
01415       }
01416 
01421       public CheckerException(String msg)
01422          : this(null, msg)
01423       {
01424       }
01425 
01431       public CheckerException(TreeNode node, String msg)
01432          : base(msg)
01433       {
01434          this.errors = new List<Pair<TreeNode, string>>();
01435          AddError(node, msg);
01436       }
01437 
01443       public void AddError(TreeNode node, String msg)
01444       {
01445          errors.Add(new Pair<TreeNode, string>(node, msg));
01446       }
01447 
01452       public void SetLastError(TreeNode node)
01453       {
01454          this.errors[errors.Count - 1].First = node;
01455       }
01456 
01461       public Pair<TreeNode, String> GetLastError()
01462       {
01463          return errors.Count > 0 ? errors[errors.Count - 1] : null;
01464       }
01465 
01469       public int ErrorCount { get { return errors.Count; } }
01470 
01471       public override string ToString()
01472       {
01473          StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();
01474          foreach (Pair<TreeNode, String> p in errors)
01475          {
01476             TreeNode node = p.First;
01477             if (node != null)
01478                sb.AppendLine(node.Line + ":" + node.CharPositionInLine + "\t" + p.Second);
01479             else
01480                sb.AppendLine(p.Second);
01481          }
01482          if (sb.Length > 0 && sb[sb.Length - 1] == '\n')
01483             sb.Remove(sb.Length - 1, 1);
01484          return sb.ToString();
01485       }
01486    }
01487 }
